display_long_description:
Jump into the party of the year in Party Versus - the mixed reality game where you can play with friends and family across the world, right from the comfort of your own home!

Play dozens of hilarious minigames and clinch victory by winning the coveted neon Party Crown. Whether you’re playing Sticky Potato, Spike Attack, or Milky Way Moovers, you will have hours of fun - and chaos - in this wacky multiplayer experience.

Why is Party Versus the new way to party?

- REIMAGINE YOUR GAME NIGHT: Want an awesome opportunity to connect with friends and family, wherever you are? This highly social game is the next evolution to the standard, in-person game night.

[media]

- MAKE NEW FRIENDS: Play with your friends in a private party or find a public party to make a bunch of new ones! Play with up to 4 people in this new way of socializing.

[media]

- AMAZING IN MIXED REALITY:  Incorporate gameplay directly into your playspace, transforming your room into a mixed reality party that ensures even the furniture will be a part of the action. Quick -- watch out for that explosive potato behind your couch!

- WIN PARTY FAVORS: What's a party without presents? Win minigames to earn wands, glowsticks, and sparklers to share with your friends – or keep for yourself.

- GET TWISTED: During some games you can play upside down, or see your friends’ rooms inverted in ‘twisted’ mode.

[media]


**Play anywhere. Party everywhere!**
